Title: Relates to the criminal impersonation of an employee of a public utility company or corporation
Summary: Adds the act of pretending to be an employee of a public utility company or corporation for the purpose of knowingly entering or remaining unlawfully in or upon a premises to the crime of criminal impersonation in the first degree, a class E felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to criminal impersonation of an employee of a public utility company or corporation
